entry.title: Process over outcome building antifragile identity
entry.id: http://localhost:4000/Process Over Outcome - Building Antifragile Identity
entry.content:
Process Over Outcome: Building Antifragile Identity

Core Thesis

Why focusing on inputs creates more resilient self-concept - how process-oriented thinking builds antifragile identity that gets stronger under stress rather than breaking.

Key Notes to Reference

Literature Notes

  • [[Trust the Process Framework]] - Systematic approach to process-focused development
  • [[Career transitions require values alignment for psychological sustainability]] - How process orientation supports major life changes

Evergreen Notes

  • [[Process-over-outcome builds resilient identity]] - The core principle of antifragile identity development
  • [[Identity anchors; payoff pulls]] - How process becomes identity anchor while outcomes provide direction
  • [[Track inputs, not outputs]] - The practical framework for process-focused living
  • [[Service or devotion makes it worth it]] - How process orientation connects to meaning through service

Potential Structure

  1. Why outcome-focused identity is fragile (external validation, finite games)
  2. Process as identity anchor - who you are vs what you achieve
  3. How process-orientation creates antifragility (learning from setbacks)
  4. Practical frameworks for shifting from outcome to process focus
  5. Case studies of process-oriented success

Related Ideas

  • Connect to identity work - process as foundation for stable identity
  • Link to service orientation - process focus enables sustainable devotion
  • Tie to mental models for engineers - systems thinking applied to personal development
